Welcome to Sultana's Kitchen

Savor Authentic Dishes Crafted with Passion

Sultana’s love for cooking hearty, flavoursome Indian food has been a lifelong passion. After dedicating over 25 years to public service in the Department of Commercial Taxes, Government of Karnataka, she took a bold step toward her culinary dream. With a flair for entertaining and a knack for perfecting traditional recipes, Sultana identified a gap in the market for authentic homemade cuisine. This inspired her to create Sultana's Kitchen—where heritage recipes come to life with old-fashioned cooking techniques and premium, handpicked ingredients.

Now, you can savor the rich flavors and cultural depth of Sultana’s authentic dishes, such as her made-to-order Heritage Biryani, Specialty Curries, and Middle Eastern Mandi, right in the comfort of your home.

read more about us

Our Menu

You can now experience a bit of Sultana’s hospitality in your own home, with her made-to-order Heritage Biryani, Speciality Curries and Middle Eastern Mandi menus.

view all menu

  • Biriyani

  • Curries

  • Mandi
Signature Biryani
Mutton - ₹ 3000 / Chicken - ₹ 2200

Portions for 8 (1kg meat + 1kg rice)

A well balanced, medium spicy biryani that blends the best of Hyderabadi, Awadhi and Kolkata styles of cooking.

Awadhi Biryani
Mutton - ₹ 3000 / Chicken - ₹ 2200

Portions for 8 (1kg meat + 1kg rice)

Aromatic, subtly spiced and featuring the richness of cashew-almond paste, whole spices are filtered out halfway through the cooking process.Just the way the Nawabs liked it!

Kolkata Biryani
Mutton - ₹ 3000 / Chicken - ₹ 2200

Portions for 8 (1kg meat + 1kg rice)

Mildly spiced and containing a generous portion of khoa, the addition of potato lends another dimension of flavour and texture to this variation of Awadhi biryani.

Veg Dum Biryani
Mutton - ₹ 3000 / Chicken - ₹ 2200

Portions for 8 (1kg meat + 1kg rice)

An aromatic and flavourful blend of fresh vegetables and basmati rice, made with Sultana’s Signature Biryani spices.

Chicken Chaap
1/2 KG - ₹ 800 / 1 KG - ₹ 1600

Succulent whole chicken leg pieces are marinated overnight in curd, dry fruit paste and Sultana’s special blend of spices & flavourings, fried in pure ghee and finished in a rich, thick gravy.

Mutton Marg
1/2 KG - ₹ 1250 / 1 KG - ₹ 2300

A subtly spiced stew cooked in a paste of soaked dry fruit, this Hyderabadi dish pairs well with appams and other Indian breads - ideal for Sunday brunch.

Nalli Nihari
1/2 KG - ₹ 1250 / 1 KG - ₹ 2400

A heritage Mughlai delicacy featuring slow cooked, melt-in-the-mouth mutton shanks.

Paya Shorba
1/2 KG - ₹ 1250 / 1 KG - ₹ 2350

A light soup made with tender lamb trotters, paya shorba is famed as much for its tastiness as for its immunity building properties.

Middle Eastern Mandi
Mutton - ₹ 3000 / Chicken - ₹ 2200

Portions for 8 (1kg meat + 1kg rice)

Delicately spiced and fragrant, this popular Arabian dish contains olive oil, dry fruit, grilled leg shank pieces and rice.

Heritage flavors, heartfelt hospitality—Sultana's Kitchen brings home
authentic, handcrafted Indian cuisine, rich in tradition and taste.

Sultana’s Kitchen offers authentic, homemade Indian cuisine, prepared using traditional methods and premium ingredients. Each dish is made from scratch, bringing heritage recipes to life with rich, bold flavors and cultural authenticity.

With no artificial flavoring or shortcuts, Sultana ensures unparalleled quality. Enjoy handcrafted Heritage Biryani, Specialty Curries, and Middle Eastern Mandi—delivered with passion, care, and an unwavering commitment to excellence.

WHY CHOOSE US

Authenticity, Flavor,
Tradition: We Delivers Culinary Excellence.

Choose Sultana's Kitchen for authentic, heritage Indian cuisine made with the finest ingredients. Homemade dishes crafted with old-fashioned techniques ensure rich flavor, tradition, and authenticity. From Kerala's black pepper to Kashmiri saffron, every bite reflects culinary excellence. Experience heartfelt hospitality through our made-to-order menus, combining authentic tastes and uncompromising quality.

  • Premium Ingredients Always Ensured
  • Authentic Flavors Without Compromise
  • Crafted with Heritage Excellence
